uniques: Pillaging this improvement yields approximately [+15 Gold]

civilopediaText.text: A cursed castle that can cause one to be dazed and unable to get out.
The strong blood aura on every wall can arouse thirst.
That's right, a person may become a vampire by being bitten by a vampire, having a cat jump over a person's corpse, and by being in this cursed castle 10 nights straight.
